text: “ Halfway up the hill, he said he needed to sit down, ” she told me. “ We hadn ’ t been feeling well, so I thought, Oh, poor guy, he can ’ t make it up the hill. ” “ His glasses were fogging up he was so nervous. I kept thinking he really must not have felt well, ” Brzezinski said. Scarborough then plopped down on one knee with an oval - shaped diamond ring set in platinum that he ’ d been hiding in his suitcase for days and asked her to marry him. “ When I saw him on one knee, I started laughing nervously, almost hysterically, ” she said. “ And then he asked, and I said, ‘ Absolutely. ’ ”
